title: Nightshade

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may use a heal or attack tonic at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot attack Night 1.
- Attacking a player uses up your attack tonic.
- Successfully healing a player from an attack uses up your heal tonic.
- You may heal yourself once.
- Visiting one player recharges your tonics once you have used them up.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to heal (player)."
"You have decided to attack (player)."
"Your target was attacked!"
"Your target's defense was too strong to kill."
"You have used up your tonics, you must visit 1 player to gather more resources."

"You were attacked but someone nursed you back to health!"
"You were killed by a Nightshade!"
"They were killed by a Nightshade."
